ygData.subject: RE: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you tried to purchase gems in freeport and sell them to her for a profit? ... From: Brett P Gillmore [mailto:bgillmor@rrpc.com] Sent: Monday, August 09,
ygData.messageBody:
Have you tried to purchase gems in freeport and sell them to her for a
profit?


-----Original Message-----
From: Brett P Gillmore [mailto:bgillmor@...]
Sent: Monday, August 09, 1999 9:04 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor


From: "Brett P Gillmore" <bgillmor@...>



I checked with Nora Sparkles out in West Commons and she does charge alot
more
for gems then any other merchant. So much so there was 100 plat difference
between her and the merchant in N. freeport. I'm thinking they jacked the
rates
on her because she might sell to the evil races.
